name: Godot Docs Dark Theme
description: A dark theme for the Godot docs.
additional_info:
Did that so I can read the docs more comfortably. Feel free to use it.

Changed the font on code, tables and highlights to Fira Mono. Note: userstyles.org does not support @import, barring direct use of google fonts. If your font is still the hard to read default, you may install Fira Mono locally, and it'll probably work.
